channel.title: Have 'YOU' ever been hacked?
channel.description: Have YOU ever been hacked on runescape2? If so. Post here and tell me :|

item.title: Have 'YOU' ever been hacked?
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

[quote=“Sleep, post:21, topic:63698”][quote author=MastrChief link=topic=92247.msg976294#msg976294 date=1173148952]
My “friend” keylogged me on his computer, (personal keylogger, i use em now with encrypted password) Took 35Mil in items along with 200k tokkul i was saving
[/quote]
Bullshit… you cannot trade Tokkul…[/quote]

Finally looked back in this topic…

Hey douche bag, its called buying items with the tokkul. Did you even stop to think of that?

Read full topic

exe your one of the people i hate if i see you you wont have a life no famliy and youll be mentily ill you fag shut up and go get a life and friends you live in a cardboard box you hobo you need to be nice if you didnt say a mean thing to me on a post i made i wouldnt have this hppane get a life you make everyones life misrable you fuckin fag go suck your dads ugly fuck greasy balls you need to be nice why you here in the first place you FAG!!! conversation over im done talking to you you no life scum fuckin nigger

If you knew my dad, you would shit yourself, hes fucking huge and he would whip your bitchy little ass;

item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

[quote=“Bebemycat2, post:8, topic:63698”]I believe the correct term you are looking for is “cracked”.

Your account was cracked.

Don’t mix hacked and cracked. :)[/quote]
im on crack =) rofl[br][size=1]Posted on: March 25, 2007, 02:29:48 PM[/size][hr][quote=“linkinxxpark, post:55, topic:63698”]my lvl 110 was but he was lvl 76 though he didnt have much but he had 2 d2hs and i have worked more then years ( maybe lieing here ) but i lost those others were almost rare then my 2 d2hs but those the hcker didnt need they have it i think i dont know but i worked like 2 years on those 2 d2hs i had i cryed and got mad jagex banned the hacker found the hacker he was using a prgram too hack i hate programs that give you advantages but i had too do alot for money on the 2hs =( but one my mains is lvl 110 was the hacked acc lvl 78 with 2 d2hs my other main is lvl 124 i change pass every day once every 3 hours cause hackers can get that one and my lvl 124 has 4 santas and well alot of rares too much too tell you lol … =)[/quote]
repeating much?

Read full topic
